```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(zoomss)
```

```{r}

input_params <- zCreateInputs(time = seq(0, 100, by = 0.01) ,
                              sst = 15,
                              chl = 0.15,
                              isave = 10) # Save ~ monthly

out <- zoomss_model(input_params)


```
```{r}

zPlot_AbundTimeSeries(out)

```


```{r}

zPlot_BiomassTimeSeries(out)

```
